author: Nikafol
title: TLM2 CMF Box of 3x20
review:
Brand new recyclable packaging contains 20 different characters from the latest LEGO movie - The Second part. Containing many well known revamped characters from an apocalyptic era, these a great addition to the CMF range.

Emmet is back with coffee, Wildstyle appears in two styles, Abe is steam punked, Crazy Cat lady has embraced the future punk and even Merman has evolved. Even President Business is a golfer!

Several other characters have cool costumes: Crayon kid, Watermelon man, Giraffe guy & Candy rapper girl; along with 4 figs holding microphones it’s a karaoke party with my favourite rock star Kitty Purry on guitar

Spaceman Benny, Unikitty & Rex reflect the new movie character versions and join in the team.

Finally we have the addition of the Wizard of Oz characters: Cowardly Lion, Tinman, Scarecrow, Dorothy & Toto.

The best news is every box contains 3 full sets!!!
